betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Plague is an effect caused by Plague Rat bites that prevents you from regaining health. The plague rats can be found in dark enviroments like normal rats and will spread its plague to any non-tamed rat that it comes in contact with.

You can craft Herbs and Plague Stew or trade with the Plague Doctor to get cures.

If nearby, the Plague Doctor will cure your plague and will cure the plague rats.
